long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BitCro Search extension sets your Default Search Engine (Omni Bar) to Yahoo. You can run searches from Chrome's search bar!

By installing our extension, you allow us modifying and reconfigure your Default Search Engine (Omni Bar) settings in order to provide you with this search features.
